title: ICYMI - Sallie Krawcheck Discusses Ellevest's Mission to Eliminate the Gender Investing Gap
itunes:title: ICYMI - Sallie Krawcheck Discusses Ellevest's Mission to Eliminate the Gender Investing Gap
description:
Ellevest co-founder and CEO Sallie Krawcheck gives her take on the state of gender pay equity and workplace diversity and describes how her company empowers female investors.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
